page.title: 18MEDIA 1.
page.content:
{NEWSPAPERS & MAGAZINES}Local newsagents state that "Sun" & "Daily Mirror" most popular daily papers replaced by "News of the World" & "Sunday Mirror" on Sundays."Times" & "Sunday Times" most popular 'quality' newspapers.Magazines & comic sales declining due to increasing costs. {'Radio Times','TV Times','Woman' & {'Woman's Own'}most popular weekly magazines. {NEWSPAPER COLLECTION & DELIVERY}Papers collected from Newbury station at 04.30 am.,taken to shop & sorted. On sale from 05.30 am.Boys,13 plus years of age deliver locally from 07.00 am.No delivery in outlying areas.
.
